author-notes.corresp: Address correspondence to Krzysztof Pyrc, k.a.pyrc@uj.edu.pl.

fn.p: Aleksandra Milewska and Anna Kula-Pacurar contributed equally to this work. Author order was determined considering the seniority.

Citation Milewska A, Kula-Pacurar A, Wadas J, Suder A, Szczepanski A, Dabrowska A, Owczarek K, Marcello A, Ochman M, Stacel T, Rajfur Z, Sanak M, Labaj P, Branicki W, Pyrc K. 2020. Replication of severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 in human respiratory epithelium. J Virol 94:e00957-20. https://doi.org/10.1128/JVI.00957-20.
